name: Product Manager
description:
The international company with a newly established office in Moscow is looking for a Product Manager. We provide our clients with services in various industries and sectors such as development, IT, marketing, and accounting. We would like you to join our successful team and work together for mutual benefit and growth.


Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in product management within dynamic, agile environments preferably with CRM domain;
  • Proven ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams like engineering, design, marketing, and data science;
  • Experience in validating product hypotheses, A/B testing;
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and critical thinking skills;
  • Strong business sense and a real passion for using data to make decisions;
  • Understand the general relationships of the product with other components of the system;
  • Experience with web and native applications;
  • Upper-intermediate (or higher) level of English.

Responsibilities:

  • Generate product improvements, ideas based on the market, customer, and technical insight and prove them with business cases that can improve key metrics in „x” times;
  • Provide market, competitors research, implement best practices;
  • Mentor Product team members;
  • Find the differences in user journeys based on different markets and convert them into product features;
  • Create product plans and roadmaps in cooperation with hire managers;
  • Understand and improve behavioural and business metrics;
  • Evangelize product culture within the organization;
  • Coordinate the acceptance criteria with the development team.

Conditions:

  • Official employment according to the labour code of the Russian Federation;

  • Official monthly paid salary (the level to be discussed with a successful candidate);

  • Insurance program;

  • Corporate mobile services;

  • Corporate laptop;

  • Paid week of sick leaves after a year of work;

  • Growth and skill development within our company;

  • Office in the Moscow city center;

  • Friendly team and warm environment;

  • Remote work is possible.
